GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all the articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an array of the specified article by article_id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments for a specified article_id

comments.author: weegembump
comments.body: Comment text from a comment linked to an article by article_id

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves an array of the specified user by username

POST /api/articles.description: posts a new article as an array into the database

article.title: This is a new article title
article.author: rogersop

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a new comment to an article by specified article_id

POST /api/topics.description: posts a new topic to the database

topic.Desription: Description of new topic title here

POST /api/users.description: posts a new user to the database

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: patches/updates an existing article by article_id and increases/decreases the votes property by the specified amount

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: patches/updates an existing comment by comment_id and increases/decreases the votes property by the specified amount

comment.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!
comment.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a specified comment by comment_id from the database - no response sent

DELETE /api/articles/:article_id.description: deletes a specified article by article_id from the database - no response send
